items.description: Wear something as a hat that isn't a hat!
Everyone does a drawing challenge: closest to what I describe wins
Everyone has to find something green and shiny the house – First one back wins
Go to the Facebook chat and type the word 'Mum'. Select from the words predictive text gives you until you have a 'poem' (or funny sentence). – Best (by group consensus) wins.
Go to Amazon.com. Find the funniest product made of chocolate – Funniest (by group consensus)  wins
Go to the pantry and pick a food that represents each member of the group (one food per person). Post a picture in the chat with an explanation of why you chose that.
Change your zoom background to a picture that makes it look like an animal is trying to eat you
In the Facebook chat I'll send five sets of emojis which represent the title of a TV show. Write down which show it is – Person with the most correct answers wins
Everyone find a long string-like object (maybe a charging cable, measuring tape or actual string). Curl it to write the word 'mother' – Most legible wins
You have 2mins to collect as many types of items that start with M as possible. No multiples of the same item – Most different items wins.
In teams of two, everyone has to take a panorama, try to get your team mate in it as many times as possible – Most appearances wins both people an egg
Find something floral to wear and put it on
Everyone create a self portrait with objects from around the house – Most accurate wins
Use Facebook messenger to take a selfie and draw on it so you look like your face is emerging from a bouquet. Share it in our chat.
Everyone has 30 seconds to go and grab the longest book they can find. Longest wins.
You have 2mins to put on as many tops as you can – Person wearing the most tops at the end of 2mins wins
Stack three round fruit (apples, mandarins etc) on top of each other – it has to stand on its own for three seconds
